projects.title: Senior Project: Volunteer Social Media Platform
projects.subtitle: January 2015 - December 2015

items.description: Managed group of five to ensure that deliverables were met on time and within a hypothetical budget
Regularly communicated with clients to update progress, deliver reports, and discuss project details
Created dynamic user experience using MongoDB, Angular.js, and Node.js
Streamlined development by scaffolding application boilerplate with Yeoman
Wrote extensive unit and integration tests with Karma and Protractor
Followed the Wikibook “Write yourself a Scheme in 48 hours” to learn Haskell design patterns
Created scalable input parsing mechanism using Parsec parser-combinator library
Added exception-handling logic via Monads and strongly-typed error checking
Mitigated mutable state with pure functions and type-level abstractions
